turns.userPrompt:
Add task assignment functionality:
- Backend: Update task model to include assignee_id
- API endpoint to get project members: GET /projects/:id/members
- Frontend: Assignee dropdown in task form showing project members
- Display assignee avatar/name on task cards
- "My Tasks" page showing all tasks assigned to current user across all projects
- Unassigned tasks should show "Unassigned" label
